name: DeleteWebinar
description:
Delete a Zoom webinar.

Use this tool to delete a webinar on Zoom. Requires a Pro or higher plan with the webinar add-on. The necessary OAuth scopes must be authorized, and it adheres to a LIGHT rate limit.

parameters.name: webinar_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the Zoom webinar to be deleted. This is required to specify which webinar should be removed.

parameters.name: webinar_occurrence_id
parameters.description: The ID of the specific webinar occurrence to delete. Required for webinars with multiple occurrences.

value_schema.description: The meeting or webinar occurrence ID.

parameters.name: send_cancellation_notifications
parameters.description: Set to true to email panelists and registrants about webinar cancellation. Defaults to false.

value_schema.description:
`true` - Notify panelists and registrants about the webinar cancellation via email. 

`false` - Do not send any email notification to webinar registrants and panelists. 

The default value of this field is `false`.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Zoom API.

parameters.name: occurrence_id
parameters.description: The meeting or webinar occurrence ID.

value_schema.description: The meeting or webinar occurrence ID.

parameters.name: cancel_webinar_reminder
parameters.description:
`true` - Notify panelists and registrants about the webinar cancellation via email. 

`false` - Do not send any email notification to webinar registrants and panelists. 

The default value of this field is `false`.

value_schema.description:
`true` - Notify panelists and registrants about the webinar cancellation via email. 

`false` - Do not send any email notification to webinar registrants and panelists. 

The default value of this field is `false`.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
